title: Sony SST Type Project - Monotype
content:
[http://www.sony.net/SonyInfo/design/works/projects/sst-font/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123040310/http:/www.sony.net/SonyInfo/design/works/projects/sst-font/ "http://www.sony.net/SonyInfo/design/works/projects/sst-font/")

Just wanted to share this link on type design.
author: monochrome

comments.content:
The Arabic bothers me. It has charm, but it clashes in character with the rest.

hhp

“Yeah, we want something original, so we’re just gonna do yet another Frutiger incarnation.”  
Sony and Kobayashi, that’s all you got?
